descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxhabitat real estate is proud to present this brand new fully furnished contemporary designed villa on Palm Jumeirah.
The owner has spared no cost to make sure that the home has been fitted with the highest quality of finishing and furniture. The seafront home is located on Frond N which means you will be located on a Palm Frond with only newly built bespoke homes.
The ground floor features a guest room and formal and family areas, as well as an equipped kitchen, grease kitchen in the back for more heavy cooking and a staff quarter with an entrance from the service corridor outside. There is space for two covered car parking. 
The first floor can be reached by elevator or grand staircase at the entrance of the home. Four bedrooms are located upstairs with the master bedroom having a beautiful walk-in wardrobe and sea view bathtub. Additional space between the bedrooms of the front and back of the home has been turned into a lovely family room. The property has also been integrated with smart home technology.
Please get in touch to book your viewing today.']
